backend/main.mo: Actor storing products in a Map with CRUD methods and auto-incrementing IDs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining persisted state and a no-op run function that returns the given state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining OKLCH color tokens, theming variables, and light/dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the page title and loading the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling login, roles, product/order logic, admin notifications, UTM identifier, and global footer content.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface for adding, editing, deleting products with validation, image upload, dialogs, and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/HowToAddProducts: Instructional card component explaining steps for adding products with icons and tips.
frontend/src/components/LoginView.tsx: Login form validating credentials and assigning admin or customer role based on username/password.
frontend/src/components/OrdersPanel.tsx: Displays grouped customer orders with clear-history functionality and UI dialogs.
frontend/src/components/ShopView.tsx: Shows sortable, searchable product list and allows placing orders with loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors and refetches dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Manages orders in localStorage with functions to add and clear orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches and mutates products via backend actor using React Query with add, update, and delete operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theming variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/productMapping.ts: Converts product data between backend bigint format and UI string format, including price parsing.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types/order.ts: Defines the Order interface with product name, timestamp, and optional customer name.
frontend/src/types/product.ts: Defines the Product interface with id, name, price, and optional image.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme settings, custom colors, fonts, shadows, and keyframes, plus plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
